tooltip.srthtools.romiumsword: §7This was definitely the same sword they used in Wallachia.
tooltip.srthtools.romiumpickaxe: §7Its kinda just like an iron pickaxe but with more durability.
tooltip.srthtools.romiumaxe: §7Dont even bother using this in axe pvp.
tooltip.srthtools.rawuranium: §7A highly radioactive metal used at least in this mod to make explosives. I wouldn't recommend holding it because of the radiation but who cares its minecraft!
tooltip.srthtools.uranium: §7A piece of uranium metal that is still dangerous but not enriched yet.
tooltip.srthtools.enricheduranium: §7Woah, now thats some deadly stuff. Also how are you still alive right now?
tooltip.srthtools.copper: §7A rather soft metal that is very conductive.
tooltip.srthtools.coppernugget: §7Its kinda just a small peice of copper, dont know what you need it for.
tooltip.srthtools.tungsten: §7A metal so tough it can be put in lava and not melt.
tooltip.srthtools.tungstennugget: §7So what if its small its still tough as heck!
